tool.name: GenBank Source Extractor
tool.description: Extract host genus & species from GenBank files
tool.help:
**What it does**
Extract source information from a GenBank file. If there's a source feature with a /host field
::
source 1..38439 /organism="Pseudomonas phage B3" /strain="ATCC15692-B1" /host="Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (ATCC 15692)"
Then this will be parsed into a table like the following:
::
# ID Host Genus Host Species Host Strain Other NC_006548 Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (ATCC 15692)
If there isn't a source feature with a host qualifier, then we'll failover to detecting it from the genome name and less information will be available:
::
# ID Host Genus Host Species Host Strain Other NC_006548 Pseudomonas
